scripts.lerna:b: npm run clean && husky install && git pull && lerna bootstrap
scripts.publish:f: npm run scz && npm run build:all && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:c: npm run scz && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:npm-cli: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-cli-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-common: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-common-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-component: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-component-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-component-extra: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-component-extra-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-component-prism: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-component-prism-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-framework: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-framework-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-common-only && npm run publish:npm-component-only && npm run publish:npm-component-extra-only && npm run publish:npm-component-prism-only && npm run publish:npm-framework-only && npm run publish:npm-cli-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.scz: git stage -A && npm run cz && git push
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run clean:framework && npm run clean:simple && npm run lerna:b
scripts.start:dva-skipCompression: npm run build:common-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:common-skipCompression: npm run build:common-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:component-skipCompression: npm run build:component-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:component-extra-skipCompression: npm run build:component-extra-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:component-prism-skipCompression: npm run build:component-prism-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:framework-skipCompression: npm run build:framework-skipCompression && npm run start
scripts.start:weapp:build: npm run build:dva-skipCompression && npm run build:common-skipCompression && npm run build:component-skipCompression && npm run build:component-extra-skipCompression && npm run build:component-prism-skipCompression && npm run build:framework-skipCompression && npm run start:weapp:simple
scripts.start:h5:build: npm run build:common-skipCompression && npm run build:component-skipCompression && npm run build:component-extra-skipCompression && npm run build:component-prism-skipCompression && npm run build:framework-skipCompression && npm run start:h5:simple
scripts.build:fvp: npm run build:f && npm run build:vp
scripts.build:all: npm run build:dva && npm run build:common && npm run build:component && npm run build:component-extra && npm run build:component-prism && npm run build:framework
scripts.build:weapp:build: npm run build:all && npm run build:weapp:simple
scripts.build:h5:build: npm run build:all && npm run build:h5:simple
scripts.ncu:u:all: ncu -u && npm run ncu:u:rollup && npm run ncu:u:cli && npm run ncu:u:dva && npm run ncu:u:common && npm run ncu:u:component && npm run ncu:u:component-extra && npm run ncu:u:component-prism && npm run ncu:u:framework && npm run ncu:u:simple
scripts.ncu:all: ncu && npm run ncu:rollup && npm run ncu:cli && npm run ncu:dva && npm run ncu:common && npm run ncu:component && npm run ncu:component-extra && npm run ncu:component-prism && npm run ncu:framework && npm run ncu:simple
scripts.lint: umi g tmp && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:all:fix: npm run lint:common:fix && npm run lint:component:fix && npm run lint:component-extra:fix && npm run lint:component-prism:fix && npm run lint:framework:fix && npm run lint:simple:fix
